text: Kɨ guizbangɨra ovengamin arazitam damighɨva kɨ ovengam. Kɨ ovevemɨn arɨmangɨghan kogham. Ezɨ Judaba na gasir mɨgɨrɨgɨaba, da mɨngariba puvatɨghtɨ, tav na inigh Judabar dafarim datɨghan kogham. Sisar nan kotiam baraghasa kɨ ifonge!”(25:11) Romɨn Arazibar mam ghaze, Romɨn gumazitam nɨghnɨsi, kotɨn aven me deragha an akam baraghizir puvatɨ, eghtɨ a kotɨn azaraghtɨ, Sisar uabɨ an kotiam baragham. Sisar, a Rombar atrivibar ziam.
